title: (x) Brasil Portugal football - Akzidenz-Grotesk Cond {Joseph D}
content:
Hi friend i would like that you can help me to ID this font please   
 [http://www.tunkyee.com/tunk2516/football/jerseys/ronaldobrasilhomeXL/1%20](http://web.archive.org/web/20110812193001/http:/www.tunkyee.com/tunk2516/football/jerseys/ronaldobrasilhomeXL/1%20)(2).jpg   
 [http://www.tunkyee.com/tunk2516/football/jerseys/ronaldinhobrasilhome/1.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20110812193001/http:/www.tunkyee.com/tunk2516/football/jerseys/ronaldinhobrasilhome/1.jpg)   
 [http://www.tunkyee.com/yeezyeez/football/Euro2004/c.ronaldo/1%20](http://web.archive.org/web/20110812193001/http:/www.tunkyee.com/yeezyeez/football/Euro2004/c.ronaldo/1%20)(1).jpg   
 [http://www.tunkyee.com/tunk2516/football/jerseys/cronaldoportugalawayM/1%20](http://web.archive.org/web/20110812193001/http:/www.tunkyee.com/tunk2516/football/jerseys/cronaldoportugalawayM/1%20)(2).jpg   
thank you very much   
   
Emiko
author: anonymous

comments.content: It has been aswered before the typeface is Akzidenz Grotesk Light Condensed

Actually it's just plain Condensed, not Light.   
But it also looks like it's been further compressed.
[Here](http://web.archive.org/web/20110812193001/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/33770.html?1082554283)'s that other thread about a Nike Ronaldo shirt.

you can get the jersey effect onto any typeface by using Mister Retro's Machine wash filters:   
   
 [http://www.misterretro.com/machine\_wash\_filters.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20110812193001/http:/www.misterretro.com/machine_wash_filters.html)

yes, thank you , but i want to know the name of the font.   
   
again thanks   
   
Emiko
maybe some sort of Trade Gothic Condensed

Yeah I looked at Franklin, but there is too much modulation in the stroke widths for it to match. And the leg from the bowl in Futura's cap R meets closer to the stem than does the image.   
   
:^/

Thank you vey Much.   
and what about these numbers?
good call. for some reason i didn't bother to look at that. d'oh!

It looks like Franklin Gothic but I can't find an exact match - best I can suggest is [Futura Condensed.](http://web.archive.org/web/20110812193001/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/futura/condensed/testdrive.html?s=RONALDINHO&p=72)
